title: Advanced Human Life Detection
description: Built a prototype to detect vital signs under debris using multi-sensor fusion, signal preprocessing and a lightweight ML model. Focus was on sensor synchronization, noise filtering and robust detection in constrained environments.

title: Gesture Detection with OpenCV
description: Real-time hand-gesture recognition using OpenCV achieving ~85% accuracy across variable lighting. Implemented preprocessing, contour analysis, and a classifier pipeline.

title: Gesture-Control Contactless Switch
description: Arduino-based contactless switch using APDS-9960 sensor to toggle appliances without touch—useful for hygiene-critical environments.

title: Electronic Voting Machine (MPLAB)
description: Prototype EVM using PIC16F877A with button interfaces and buzzer feedback. Completed basic UI for candidate selection and vote recording.
